title: [WORK] Ep. 206 How To Overcome Failure and Thrive Adi Arezzini
description:
Get your own copy of Ashleyâ€™s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

Â 

What do you do when faced with failure?

Â 

Get excited to learn how to set goals and face failure head-on with Ash this week as she sits down with Adi Arezzini, the SEO and founder of Teami Blends.

Â 

Adi shares her founding story and the pathway to discovering the benefits of her product that helped her authentically be able to sell it so well. Failure is one of the biggest fears entrepreneurship holds. Adi shares her experiences with failure and how you can overcome this fear yourself.Â 

Â 

As two businesswomen, Ash and Adi are able to offer incredible business advice on how to sustain your business, work through insecurities in business execution, and goal setting. If you are starting your own business or looking to move up in your career, there is something valuable in this episode just for YOU.

Â 

In This Episode, Youâ€™ll Learn:

  1. How to use failure as a building block for growth.
  2. Tips to handle shifts in business.
  3. How to communicate your goals and plans with those around you.
  4. How to set goals that align with your vision.

Â
